p: Female and pup survival—Deaths of both female and pup were recorded in each simulation. To assess the overall reproductive success of the females, we calculated the average success of female-pup pairs (SP) in a given environment, for each of the 10 replicated maps, as follows: SP = (1 - D f) × (1 - D p), where D f and D p are the probabilities of death for females and pups, respectively.
